评论详情: These are so trendy and unique and you won’t find them anywhere else.  The sun protection does work but they are more for style not eye protection.  They are not the best quality so pretty fragile but they work when you are going for a fun cool look.

It feels very comfortable and protects from the sun very well. Not only do they not feel heavy, they can fit on top of my perscripted glasses! It feels very sturdy, like a nice durable plastic. I will warn some people though that the spikes are pretty sharp so I suggest dulling it down with a nail file if you don't like it sharp. Love this style so much, this product is a 10/10 for me!

I absolutely love these glasses and am obsessed with them, only issues is that they are kind of too big and slip off when I look down and are kind of heavy on the nose. I wanted glasses that looked like the ones Tom Keifer wore in the 80s and these look very similar to the ones he had, but except I wanted spikes on mines. Only reason I gave it a four star instead of 5 was because of the sizing and the fact it is a little heavy on the nose.
